positions.desc: As a Priority Gun Sense Candidate, Jane George advocates for common-sense gun safety laws to prevent gun violence in her community. She supports expanding the Bipartisan Safer Communities Act and increasing funding for gun violence prevention and mental health programs. Despite being a gun owner herself, she believes that protecting children's lives is crucial and will work to implement enhanced background checks and address domestic abuser access to firearms while respecting constitutional rights.

sources.tweet:
Yet my opponent said, “We’re not going to fix it,” in response to gun violence.

This attitude is unacceptable. We need leaders who will fight for common-sense gun safety laws to keep our kids safe, not throw their hands up. I will be that leader.
